OPTION_ACCEPT - Static variable in class gui.NewComponentDialog
the accept option for this dialog, save the component
OPTION_CANCEL - Static variable in class gui.NewComponentDialog
the cancel option for this dialog, dont save the component
OUTPUT - Static variable in class gui.PlaceholderPin
the type of an output pin on the custom component
OUTPUT - Static variable in class model.LogicComponent
a component's function if it has no inputs
OUTPUT_PIN - Static variable in class gui.ComponentPin
the pin type for an output pin
Or2Gate - class model.Or2Gate.
Or2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input OR gate.
Or2Gate(Model) - Constructor for class model.Or2Gate
Constructs a solitary new Or2Gate object.
Or2Image - class gui.Or2Image.
Or2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or2Gate.
Or2Image() - Constructor for class gui.Or2Image
Constructs a new instance of Or2Image, used by the toybox.
Or2Image(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.Or2Image
Constructs a new instance of Or2Image with a given location in the sandbox.
Or3Gate - class model.Or3Gate.
Or3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a three-input OR gate.
Or3Gate(Model) - Constructor for class model.Or3Gate
Constructs a solitary new Or3Gate object.
Or3Image - class gui.Or3Image.
Or3Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or3Gate.
Or3Image() - Constructor for class gui.Or3Image
Constructs a new instance of Or3Image, used by the toybox.
Or3Image(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.Or3Image
Constructs a new instance of Or3Image with a given location in the sandbox.
Or4Gate - class model.Or4Gate.
Or4Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a four-input OR gate.
Or4Gate(Model) - Constructor for class model.Or4Gate
Constructs a solitary new Or4Gate object.
Or4Image - class gui.Or4Image.
Or4Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or4Gate.
Or4Image() - Constructor for class gui.Or4Image
Constructs a new instance of Or4Image, used by the toybox.
Or4Image(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.Or4Image
Constructs a new instance of Or4Image with a given location in the sandbox.
outputPinLocations - Static variable in class gui.ComponentImage
the collection of visual locations for component output pins.
outputPins - Variable in class gui.ComponentImage
the component's graphical wire attachment points (outputs)
outputValues - Variable in class model.LogicComponent
an array of the currently computed output values
outputs - Variable in class model.LogicComponent
an array of collections that contain output ConnectionPoints representing outgoing connections to other components
